Articles.Content:
ok so background story first: my computer at home is as advanced these days as fire is to us. >.> so I installed KSP via a steam library onto my 16 gb flash drive. KSP and a less than 1 GB speed boost program are the only things on it.

I added mechjeb2 for the precision burns,

stage recovery because i'm playing career mode

station science so I have a reason to build a space station besides refueling.(side note: where are the experiments? I can't find them in the tech tree/VAB)

now onwards to the interesting part

I launched a team of 2 kerbals (1 pilot, 1 scientist) to perform a zoom by of the satellite body minmus ( please forgive me if spelling is incorrect. it's the second satellite around kerban.) to grab some delicious science. I collected a large amount and was ready to escape back to kerbin when BAM my team fails to escape properly and all h**l breaks lose. my "orbit" if you can call it that radically changes on it's own and forces me to reset the launch.

i've tried reseting the launch 3 times. I've even reset the game by quitting and relaunching. nothing so far.

any ideas where this bug is coming from? at least I can orbit and escape mun just fine. I haven't tried to escape kerbin yet though.

final note: I have about a hour left of computer time at library when I post this and I can't return till monday.

thank you all for helping or at least reading!
it sounds like you were captured by minmus's gravity.
